prompt_template: Given user query {Q_user}, decomposed sub-queries {SQ}, and metadata {M_meta}, verify the completeness (∀t G(t) ⇒ P(t)) and soundness (∀t P(t) ⇒ G(t)) of the decomposition using FOL. Output logical equivalence or specific errors.

input_example.Q_user: What types of ground transportation are available in Denver?

SQ.sq_2: Find transport_types for city_code from sq_1

output_example.details: ∀t (G(t) ⇔ P(t)) verified via SMT solver (Z3). No counterexamples found.

design_rationale: The prompt uses FOL to ensure decomposition covers all query aspects without extraneous results, leveraging SMT solvers (Section 3.5.1).
